title: SOLD: 1906 RPPC Lykens PA with Jake Daubert
author: rholmes

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1906 RPPC Lykens PA with Jake Daubert
posts.post_content:
FS: 1906 RPPC featuring a young Jake Daubert (kneeling, far right) with the Lykens team (aka W&L AA) in the Williams Valley League, PA. Daubert would go on star at 1B for 15 seasons with Brooklyn and Cincinnati before his premature death, age 40, in 1924. Rare postcard. 


SOLD shipped (paypal or check is fine)

PM or email with interest.

Email: semloh00 (at) yahoo.com

Thx,
Ray
